titleInfo.title: Meyers v. City of Fresno et al.
titleInfo.subTitle: Preliminary Scheduling ORDER: (1) 10/1/2012 deadline to file and serve moving papers on class certification; (2) 10/26/2012 deadline to file and serve opposition papers on class certification; (3) 11/16/2012 deadline to file and serve reply papers on class certification; and (4) A hearing on December 14, 2012 at 09:00 AM in Courtroom 8 (BAM) before Magistrate Judge Barbara A. McAuliffe. Additionally, a Mandatory Scheduling Conference is set for 1/15/2013 at 09:00 AM in Courtroom 8 (BAM) before Magistrate Judge Barbara A. McAuliffe. Parties may appear at this hearing by telephone. signed by Magistrate Judge Barbara A. McAuliffe on 11/10/2011. (Herman, H)

McAuliffe. Additionally, a Mandatory Scheduling Conference is set for 1/15/2013 at 09:00 AM in Courtroom 8 (BAM) before Magistrate Judge Barbara A. McAuliffe. titleInfo.title: Meyers v. City of Fresno et al.
titleInfo.subTitle: SECOND SCHEDULING ORDER. After discussion with counsel, this Court SETS the following dates for class certification only: (1) All class discovery, including motions to compel and discovery ordered as a result of a motion to compel, shall be completed by May 1, 2013. (2) Plaintiffs shall file and serve moving papers on class certification by May 31, 2013; (3) Defendants shall file and serve opposition papers on class certification by July 5, 2013; (4) Plaintiffs shall file and serve reply papers on class certification by July 19, 2013; and (5) A hearing on Plaintiffs Motion for class certification is set for August 23, 2013, at 9:00 AM, in Courtroom 8, before Magistrate Judge Barbara A. McAuliffe. signed by Magistrate Judge Barbara A. McAuliffe on 2/8/2013. (Herman, H)

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 1:10-cv-02359; Meyers v. City of Fresno et al.;
extension.courtName: United States District Court Eastern District of California
extension.docketText: SECOND SCHEDULING ORDER. After discussion with counsel, this Court SETS the following dates for class certification only: (1) All class discovery, including motions to compel and discovery ordered as a result of a motion to compel, shall be completed by May 1, 2013. (2) Plaintiffs shall file and serve moving papers on class certification by May 31, 2013; (3) Defendants shall file and serve opposition papers on class certification by July 5, 2013; (4) Plaintiffs shall file and serve reply papers on class certification by July 19, 2013; and (5) A hearing on Plaintiffs Motion for class certification is set for August 23, 2013, at 9:00 AM, in Courtroom 8, before Magistrate Judge Barbara A. McAuliffe. signed by Magistrate Judge Barbara A. McAuliffe on 2/8/2013. (Herman, H)

titleInfo.title: Meyers v. City of Fresno et al.
titleInfo.subTitle: STIPULATION to Stay Proceedings and ORDER THEREON, signed by Magistrate Judge Sheila K. Oberto on 6/25/2013. (IT IS HEREBY ORDERED that: 1. Discovery and all class certification deadlines are hereby STAYED; 2. The 8/21/2013, hearing on Plaintiffs' motion for class certification is VACATED; 3. The parties shall file status reports regarding their settlement discussion progress on 8/30/2013; and 4. The parties shall submit a new proposed scheduling order regarding class certification and discovery on or before 10/29/2013.) (Gaumnitz, R)

titleInfo.title: Meyers v. City of Fresno et al.
titleInfo.subTitle: STIPULATION and ORDER for Additional Stay. The stay on discovery and all class certification shall be extended through December 30, 2013; and the parties shall submit a new proposed scheduling order regarding class certification and discovery on or before January 2, 2014. Order signed by Magistrate Judge Sheila K. Oberto on 10/29/2013. (Timken, A)

titleInfo.title: Meyers v. City of Fresno et al.
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER AFTER SETTLEMENT. On May 29, 2014, the parties filed a joint status report indicating that they had reached a settlement, 59. The parties shall file the appropriate pleadings to dismiss or conclude this action by no later than 9/12/2014. The Court VACATES all pending matters and dates. Order signed by Magistrate Judge Sheila K. Oberto on 6/2/2014. (Timken, A)

Order signed by Magistrate Judge Sheila K. Oberto on 6/2/2014. (Timken, A)
